header.title: About Me
header.subtitle: A Multi-lingual AI Product Owner Driving Innovation with Data and Custom Solutions

intro.title: My Objective:
intro.p1: To secure a challenging AI Product Owner role where I can leverage my expertise in AI/ML, agile methodologies, and data-driven decision-making to develop innovative, user-centric AI-powered products and drive significant business impact.

items.description: Specializing in the implementation of AI Agents and Microsoft Power Platform solutions, designing custom architectures, managing client relationships, and driving digital transformation.
Defined product vision for Assura's Chatbot, using user research to identify AI-driven enhancements, resulting in a 25% increase in customer satisfaction and a 43% sales uplift.
Provided multilingual customer support, using NLP to improve LiveChat messages and reducing response times by 10%, which contributed to a 5% increase in NPS.
Provided administrative, IT, and technical support for daily operations, managing customer relations in a multicultural environment.

latestProject.title: Latest Project
latestProject.subtitle: Google Hackathon: AI-Powered Insurance Assistant
latestProject.description: Led a team in developing a Proof of Concept (POC) AI chatbot using Gemini 1.5 Pro on Google Cloud Platform over 2 days. Defined functionality, data requirements, and user interface. Developed and tested the AI model, providing personalized insurance recommendations.

profile.bio: AI Consultant at Witivio, a Microsoft Partner. Passionate about leveraging AI for business transformation and innovative solutions.

cards.title: AI & Machine Learning
cards.description: Deep Learning, NLP, Computer Vision, Generative AI, MLOps, Data Analysis, Hypothesis Testing, and Bias Detection.

cards.title: AI Product Management
cards.description: Expertise in Strategy, Roadmap Development, Backlog Management, Prioritization, Agile/Scrum, and Data-Driven Decision-Making.

cards.title: Technical Skills
cards.description: UX/UI Design, DevOps, Web Mastering, Performance Reporting, and API Integration with platforms like Google Cloud and WordPress.

cards.title: Tools & Frameworks
cards.description: Proficient with TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, AWS AI Services, Azure AI Services, MLOps tools, and MS Office Suite.

cards.title: Testing Expertise
cards.description: Specialized in Test Planning and Execution, UAT, E2E Testing, Functional Testing, and Test Automation.

cards.title: Languages
cards.description: Native speaker proficiency in German, English, and French, enabling effective communication in multicultural environments.
